title: Where to consult store data?
lead: All essential information is available on the company's Intranet.
intro_p: It is your main work tool for quick and accurate queries.
highlight_text: Intranet ‚Üí Branches ‚Üí Registration data and hours
slider_title: üìç How to consult on the Intranet:

s1.title: Step 1: Access the Intranet
s1.text: Open your browser and access the company's internal portal. Log in with your corporate credentials.

s2.title: Step 2: Navigate to Branches
s2.text: In the main menu, locate and click on the option 'Branches' or 'Stores'.

s3.title: Step 3: Registration Data
s3.text: Select 'Registration data and hours' to access complete information for each store.

s4.title: Step 4: Consult and Inform
s4.text: Now you can check the address, phone number, and opening hours to guide the customer!

quiz1.question: A customer calls asking if the Downtown store is open on tomorrow's holiday. You don't know this information by heart. What is the most agile and safe procedure?
quiz1.opt_a: A) Ask quickly in the team's WhatsApp group to see if anyone knows.
quiz1.opt_b: B) Consult the Intranet under 'Branches' > 'Registration data and hours' to have the official information.
quiz1.opt_c: C) Search on Google Maps, as it is always updated there.
quiz1.opt_d: D) Inform that it will probably be closed, to avoid the customer making a wasted trip.
quiz1.feedback: Correct Answer! The Intranet is the only official and reliable source for branch hours.

importance_text: Mastering this query ensures agility in service, more assertive answers, standardization of information, and a more positive customer experience.

quiz2.question: Mastering information query on the Intranet contributes to:
quiz2.opt_c: C) Ensuring agility, assertiveness, and better customer experience.
quiz2.opt_d: D) Making the service more informal.
quiz2.feedback: Correct Answer! A happy customer is a customer served with agility and precision.
